Faq.title: Answers to our most Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for?

1.q: I want to keep my mobile app idea confidential. Will you sign an NDA with me?
1.a: Yes, we sign an NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement) when a client needs us to, right after our legal team reviews the agreement.

2.q: Do I have full ownership of my completed product?
2.a: Yes, you are the owner of your Intellectual Property rights at all times, including the source codes.

3.q: How long will it take to complete my product?
3.a: That very much depends on the complexity of the project. Small projects would take 2-3 months while large scale projects could take up to 6 months.

4.q: Will you assist me to publish my app on Google PlayStore, Apple App Store and Huawei App Gallery?
4.a: Yes, this would be part of our app development process. We will provide you guidance on the store's setup such as marketing materials and other configurations.

5.q: Will there be maintenance after development has been completed?
5.a: Yes. Once we've completed all developments and UAT, we support you in the process of deployment such as server deployment and publishing your app to iOS App Store / Google Playstore. Then, we offer you app maintenance services.

6.q: Do you offer app development consulting services?
6.a: Yes, we do offer FREE consultation sessions. We are also aware that clients who approached us are mostly non-technical individuals. Hence, we do our best to keep the consultation session as layman as possible.

section3.title:
It’s Time to Make a

Change for Your Business!
section3.subtitle: People are migrating towards mobile phones and computers. It's time to beat your competitors with our high technology online IT solutions.

section4.title: Quality-Driven Custom Software Development
section4.subtitle: We have a quality-focused, tailor-made approach to help you achieve your business goals.

1.title: Discovery & Analysis
1.subtitle: You can’t brainstorm, much less build, a great solution without first investing in discovery and analysis. Our team burrows into your existing infrastructure to uncover strengths and weaknesses so time isn’t wasted during the design and build phases.

2.title: UI/UX Design
2.subtitle: At its core, UX and UI design should be elegant, intuitive, and frictionless. With a diverse portfolio of successful design projects to our name, we know how to build solutions that are stylish and aesthetically pleasing — and that help you meet your business goals.

3.title: Development
3.subtitle: Speed + stability + scale. All three factors are at play with every development project we take on; we always incorporate the most appropriate and reliable technology.

4.title: Feedback and Testing
4.subtitle: At Evetech Solution, the feedback and testing process is transparent. With regular status meetings and routine check-ins by video, email, and chat, we take your ongoing feedback into account every step of the way.

5.title: Release
5.subtitle: Software release isn’t a single moment; it’s a process. As you roll out what we’ve built, we make sure that the solution works in sync with your existing systems and processes.

6.title: Refinement
6.subtitle: Many custom software developers take the “love ‘em and leave ‘em” approach to their work: They land the contract, do the work, and then move on. But with Evetech Solution, the developers who build your software stay on active standby after its release to optimize and iterate, so the solution grows with you.

section3.content:
Evetech Solution? Let's go back to 2020 when Steven Sophian Putra (Founder and Director of Evetech Solution) started Evetech Solution to help many clients and companies in achieving their business success. E-Commerce, ERP, Health Applications, Finance / Insurance Applications, Company Profile Websites are some of the products that have been successfully developed to meet client needs.



Steven realizes that his ability to solve problems by presenting innovative solutions can help many people who want to realize their dreams. He also always emphasizes that Innovation, quality, and client satisfaction are the pillars of Evetech Solution's success so that the quality of software products developed by the Evetech Solution team must be the best.

section4.title: Be A Part Of Something Big
section4.subtitle:
You have the idea, we have the software solution.

Make your dreams come true!

1.title: Setup Requirements Meeting
1.subtitle: Jointly arrange a time between the business owner and our team to formulate the problem. After that, we will provide a solution including the software.

2.title: Create Plan Together
2.subtitle: If you agree or have a topic to discuss. We can discuss it together. After finding common ground, we can make a cooperation agreement.

3.title: Get Result
3.subtitle: We will deliver the software you need. We can also help you maintain the software or update it without losing the data that has been entered in the future.

section3.title: Our Mobile App Development Is Supported By A Proven Agile Approach
section3.subtitle: We deliver a powerful mobile app development experience with a proven Agile approach. Find ease and flexibility in every step of our projects.

1.title: Discussing The Idea
1.subtitle: Evetech signs on to be your development partner. According to your custom demands, our project managers take your idea and assess product quality and the core software concept. We take time to understand what purpose your app will serve.

2.title: Planning
2.subtitle: The next step in our app development services is the product roadmap, defining the technology stack, and highlighting cost effective best practices to win competitive markets. We use industry best practices and technical expertise throughout our business processes.

3.title: Design
3.subtitle: Our app development then takes a turn for a visually-rich first wireframe. We use cutting edge technology to define how your app will look, function and feel. We deliver augmented user experiences starting in this stage of project management.

4.title: Development and Coding
4.subtitle: Innovative products are our specialty, and once we get to the coding part of our development process, you can sit back and relax. Our app development services apply our skilled resources in efficient workflows to build feature rich products.

5.title: Testing
5.subtitle: Part of our proven methodologies includes robust quality assurance. To keep users from seeing bugs and to deploy cost effective products, app development services don’t stop when a product is built. Your dedicated team employs testing as part of your product roadmap.

6.title: Release And Maintenance
6.subtitle: Our agile development methodology includes oversight of your product release and maintenance after the fact, too. Custom app development services with a reliable partner include this final maintenance as things come up when selling on a dynamic marketplace.
